name: Customer Segmentation
desc: Performed customer segmentation using K-Means clustering in Python by analyzing purchasing behavior and visualizing clusters for actionable insights.

name: Diabetes Classification
desc: Developed a diabetes prediction model using logistic regression in Python with data preprocessing, feature selection, and model evaluation.

name: House Price Prediction
desc: Developed a machine learning model in Python to predict house prices using regression algorithms with data preprocessing and evaluation.

name: Black Friday Sales
desc: Performed data analysis and machine learning on Black Friday sales to reveal customer insights and predict purchase trends.

name: Student Database Mangement System
desc: Designed a student management system using Binary Search Tree in C++ to add, delete, search, and display students based on roll numbers.

name: Portfolio
desc: This project integrates Docker for containerizing the application and implements a CI/CD pipeline to automate building, testing, and deployment, ensuring consistent environments and faster delivery cycles.

name: Crack Detection Algorithm
desc: A crack detection algorithm is a computer vision-based method used to identify cracks in surfaces like roads and walls. It involves image acquisition, preprocessing (e.g., noise removal), segmentation (to isolate cracks), feature extraction (like crack length/width), and classification using traditional or deep learning models (e.g., CNNs). This helps automate infrastructure inspection and supports timely maintenance.
